channel.title: Players on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Players on Home

item.title: Players
item.description: Battles per Player The graph shows the number of battles fought per player during the update 11.5. On average, players played 117 battles and the median battle count was 29. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.
